quotes: In October 1985, Nyerere retired as president and handed over to Ali Hassan Mwinyi
From 1985 to 1989, Salim served as deputy prime minister and Minister of Defence and National Service in the government of Mwinyi.
The major challenge that Tanzania faced was the economy and eventually the new government was forced to implement structural adjustment programmes in 1986.
